'''Gusto-Frosto''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Whirling Cryo Fungus''' that appears in the [[Lil' Fungi's Fun-Tastic Fiesta]] event.

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Whirling Cryo Fungus V3

|name_1      = Frost Barrier
|desc_1      = Releases a spout of frost that deals '''150% ATK''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}} every seconds a total of '''6''' times, and creates a {{Frozen}} shield that will protect the user for a short time.

|name_2      = Frosty Focus
|desc_2      = When Gusto-Frosto is on the field, all opponents will continually be taunted, attracting their attacks.

|name_3      = Normal Attack
|desc_3      = Unleashes 2 swift melee strikes, dealing '''150% ATK × 2''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}}.
}}
